Package org.microbean.helm.chart

Provides classes and interfaces for working with Helm charts from Java.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChartLoader<T>
    An interface indicating that implementations are capable of reading in the raw materials for a Helm chart from some kind of source and creating new ChartOuterClass.Chart instances from such raw materials.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Charts  
    DirectoryChartLoader
    A StreamOrientedChartLoader<Path> that creates ChartOuterClass.Chart instances from filesystem directories represented as Path objects.
    HelmIgnorePathMatcher
    A PathMatcher and a Predicate<Path> that matches paths using the syntax of a .helmignore file.
    NonClosingInputStream
    An exceptionally special-purpose FilterInputStream whose NonClosingInputStream.close() method performs no action.
    StreamOrientedChartLoader<T>
    A partial ChartLoader implementation that is capable of loading a Helm-compatible chart from any source that is convertible into an Iterable of InputStreams indexed by their name.
    StreamOrientedChartLoader.EmptyIterable
    An Iterable implementation that returns an empty Iterator.
    TapeArchiveChartLoader
    A StreamOrientedChartLoader<TarInputStream> that creates ChartOuterClass.Chart instances from TarInputStream instances.
    URLChartLoader
    A StreamOrientedChartLoader<URL> that creates ChartOuterClass.Chart instances from URL instances.
    ZipInputStreamChartLoader  

Package org.microbean.helm.chart Description

Provides classes and interfaces for working with Helm charts from Java.
Author:
Laird Nelson
